Diamondback Energy Inc to Acquire QEP Resources Inc - M&A Call
Dec 22, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Diamondback Energy Inc M&A conference call or presentation Monday, December 21, 2020 at 1:30:00pm GMT
